{{Infobox Berry |name = #12 Nanab |image = [[File:Nanab.png]] |caption = Bitter, but with a trace of sweetness, the Nanab Berry was the seventh to be discovered in the word. |growtime = 4m 10s |harvest = 11 berries |replant = 40% |points = 25 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *10 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} === Description === '''Nanab''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Pecha]] and at least 1 [[Aspear]]. === Growth Tables === ==== Growth Stages ==== {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 25 secs || 30 secs || 35 secs || 4 mins 10 secs - 8 mins 20 secs |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NanabTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NanabTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NanabTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Flow Chart ===
{| style="text-align: center;" |+ '''Flow Chart to get this berry''' |- | Random
Drop || || Random
Drop |- | ↓ || || ↓ |- | [[File:Pecha.png|20px]] [[Pecha]] || + || [[File:Aspear.png|20px]] [[Aspear]] |- | colspan="3" | ↓ || |- | || [[File:Nanab.png|20px]] [[Nanab]] |}
=== Mutation Strategy === ==== Possible Planting Formations ==== You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Nanab berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || || || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || || || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || |- | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || || || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |} ==== Timing Table ==== {| class="collapsible wikitable" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch/Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch*Sprayduck |- | [[Aspear]] || - || - || - |- | [[Pecha]] || 1 min until ripe || Not Practical || Not Practical |- |} {{Berries}}
